mapper.select:
select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, u.user_status, u.org_id, o.org_name, (select group_concat(r.role_name) from leafw_role r where r.role_id in (select wur.role_id from leafw_user_role wur where wur.user_id = u.user_id )) as roleNames from leafw_user u left join leafw_organization o on u.org_id = o.org_id where 1 = 1
and u.org_id = #{orgId}
and u.user_id in (select wur.user_id from leafw_user_role wur where wur.role_id = #{roleId})
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{userName}, '%')
